comment: Alot of people did not come to class on a regular basis but if you come to class you really don't have to read the book. She is VERY entertaining and has talent for making the subject interesting...do the extra credit!!! Its worth it and she grades with compassion. Wonderful lady, absolutely loved her!

She takes roll but you don't really have to go. Dr. Arnette is pretty funny if you do decide to show up for class though. As long as you read the book you will be fine. The Midterm and Final are sort of hard but she gives you some easy points along the way.

Loved this class! I had her for the 3-hr Lifespan Developmental Psychology. She is totally sweet, really cares about her students, and makes a 3 hour class bearable! Only two tests, midterm & final, with a term paper that can take place of the grade of either test. Take her class if you can!
She is awesome! Very helpful,understanding and knowledgeable! Great personality and made the class experience wonderful!!! If you get the chance, TAKE HER!!!

Whoever said for guys to not take this class, don't listen. There were only about 5 guys in that class and the women did not complain about men. The topic was about differences between the genders not about men or women in general. Dr. Arnette was a great instructor and it was an easy class. Got an A without much effort. She is really sweet too.
If you are a guy do NOT take this class. Gender psych=women complaining about men. This class is easy but extremely boring
If you are a guy DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS!! Gender Psych=Women complaining about men. Really boring but easy class

Dr. Arnette is a lovely instructor with an excellent classroom demeanor. She has a fairly clear syllabus and provides much of her lecture material online. Interesting subject taught nearly straight from the textbook. The textbook by Brannon is a liberal feminist work with significant misrepresentations. Few men in class. Should be Pscyh of Women.
I throughly enjoyed this class. She has a fun attitude and is very understanding! I miss this class!

LOVE HER!! She's very sweet.. very clear.. you have to do one presentation, a paper.. then the midterm and final.. very straightforward. Class was fun.. she makes it enjoyable! I'm sad this class is over!
